entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:21 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 10:54 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
